entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS AROUND 90

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
